column6: sc will be held eleven a. m.
column9: 2015 at the folk funeral home chapel
column10: williston with the reverend floyd dukes officiating; burial will be in the williston cemetery. the family will receive friends one hour prior to the service at the funeral home on tuesday. sharon passed away friday

column13: sc she was a daughter of lila dean lee simmons and the late leonard marvin l. m. simmons. she was a member of pleasant hill baptist church and was a homemaker. survivors include her daughter
